description:
Emergency Games Free For Kids - Is your little cop a big lover of firetrucks, police cars and emergency vehicles? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in the fire truck ambulance and police games free. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging firetruck and police sirens and emergency rescue sounds your little doctor can explore in the hospital...but the fire truck ambulance and police car rescue for free doesn't end there.

The activity app also comes with an ambulance matching game , and many beautiful, real rescue puzzle games.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a fire truck, helicopter or siren is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of emergency and siren
- 4 fun memory games of ambulance, doctor and hospital pictures
- 10 Real, high quality puzzles for 3 difficulty level with fire trucks, helicopter, ambulance and fire brigade
- Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids.

Another amazingly cool feature to the emergency games free for kids makes it even more awesome then just matching your little boy must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little emergency rescue game shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing hospital ambulance games free also promotes:
- Fine motor skills.
- Memory and recognition skills.
- Hand eye coordination.
- Early math concepts.
- ER knowledge
